summary: I PURCHASED SEARS VOYAGER LX ROAD HANDLER P195/60  R15 RADIAL TIRES FOR MY HONDA ACCORD AS REPLACEMENTS FOR THE ORIGINALS AND THE SIDEWALLS HAVE BLOWN OUT ON 2 OF THE TIRES AFTER 55,000 MILES.  THIS OCCURRED WHILE DRIVING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS BOTH INCIDENTS OCCURRED WITHIN 2 WEEKS OF EACH OTHER, BOTH TIRES BLEW THE SIDEWALLS OUT ON THE INSIDE SIDE WALL AND BOTH TIRES WERE ON THE FRONT OF THE VEHICLE.  DO I HAVE ANY RECOURSE AND WERE THERE ANY RECALLS ON THESE TIRES??  THESE TIRES ARE ADVERTISED AS 100,000 MILE TIRES.   *NLM
